Package com.redis.ds.ds_content

Class ContentType

java.lang.Object
com.redis.ds.ds_content.ContentType
public class ContentType extends Object
The ContentType class is responsible for detecting matching document types based on an application provided CSV file. Refer to the doctypes_default.csv file for a reference listing of types.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Al Cole

    • load

      public void load(String aPathFileName, boolean aWithHeaders) throws IOException
      Parses a CSV file identified by the path/file name parameter and loads it into an internally managed DataGrid.
      Parameters:
      aPathFileName - Absolute file name.
      aWithHeaders - If true, then column headers will be recognized in the CSV file.
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O related exception.
